member.name: WS_CHANNEL_ENCODER
member.summary: A structure that is used to specify a set of callbacks that can transform the content type and encoded bytes of a sent message.

member.name: WS_CHANNEL_ENCODER.createContext
member.summary: A context that will be passed to the WS_CREATE_ENCODER_CALLBACK.

member.name: WS_CHANNEL_ENCODER.createEncoderCallback
member.summary: A WS_CREATE_ENCODER_CALLBACK callback that creates an instance of an encoder.

member.name: WS_CHANNEL_ENCODER.encoderGetContentTypeCallback
member.summary: A WS_ENCODER_GET_CONTENT_TYPE_CALLBACK callback that is invoked when a message is to be encoded.

member.name: WS_CHANNEL_ENCODER.encoderStartCallback
member.summary: A WS_ENCODER_START_CALLBACK callback that is invoked to start encoding a message.

member.name: WS_CHANNEL_ENCODER.encoderEncodeCallback
member.summary: AWS_ENCODER_ENCODE_CALLBACK callback that is invoked to encode a message.

member.name: WS_CHANNEL_ENCODER.encoderEndCallback
member.summary: A WS_ENCODER_END_CALLBACK callback that is invoked to at the end of encoding a message.

member.name: WS_CHANNEL_ENCODER.freeEncoderCallback
member.summary: A WS_FREE_ENCODER_CALLBACK callback that frees an instance of an encoder.
